name: BIONA Project
short_description: BIONA is a project framework for Bulgarian small business. This framework is based on open source and QT3 (GPL licence) and include modules for Accounting (General Ladger, AP, AR, VAT, and etc.), Store, POS, Clients, Vendors, Billing, Generator for Report
